tribes.xin-xi.info:
They start their jowouwurney in the dense mowouwuntains, suwurrowouwunded by beauwutifuwul cherry blowossowom.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.imperius.info:
Huwuge mowouwuntains and green valleys. The {0} climate is perfect fowor growowing fruwuit. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.bardur.info:
Suwurviving the harsh eternal winter owof the {0} wowoowods is nowot an easy task, buwut {0} seems towo thrive here.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.oumaji.info:
The seemingly endless, suwun blessed desert is the howome owof the {0} tribe.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.kickoo.info:
White sandy beaches with cowocowonuwut palms. Abuwundance owof fruwuit and fish. Welcowome towo the howome owof the {0}. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.hoodrick.info:
The yellowow auwutuwumn leaves owof the {0} wowoowods are perfect hideowouwuts fowor its pecuwuliar muwushrowoowom stuwuffing inhabitants. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.luxidoor.info:
The {0} lowove expensive things, jewels, rare spices and excluwusive owornaments. That is alsowo why they are the mowost expensive tribe in Powolytowopia!

Their citizens lead very cowomfowortable lives, draped in the finest puwurple silk. Buwut will they suwurvive owouwutside the walls owof their belowoved capital?  

{0} starts the game with a huwuge walled capital. nya
tribes.vengir.info:
Frowowned uwupowon by the owother tribes and puwushed intowo the uwunpleasant wastelands. Will they towolerate this injuwustice owor rise towo fight back?  

{0} start the game with the '{1}' tech and a powowerfuwul Swowordman. nya
tribes.zebasi.info:
{0} thrive owon the warm savannah, cuwultivating the rich sowoil towo prowovide fowoowod fowor their mighty powopuwulatiowon. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.zebasi.news: All prowofits frowom the Zebasi tribe is invested in sowolar energy prowojects. nya
tribes.aimo.info:
The tranquwuil and wise {0} tribe inhabits the harshest, windiest and highest mowouwuntain range owof the squwuare, where they have fowouwund inner peace by meditating in the eternal evening light. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.aquarion.info:
Frowom the deep owoceans a lowong lowost civilizatiowon appears! Their extreme isowolatiowon has given them special aquwuatic abilities that are uwunknowown towo the owother mowore huwuman tribes.

{0} have a slightly different tech tree and have access towo the uwuniquwue amphibiowouwus tuwurtle uwunits that nowo owother tribe can train. nya
tribes.quetzali.info:
The {0} tribe woworship the bird gowods owof the red sowoil and live in harmowony with the natuwural symmetry owof their cuwubistic juwungles. They are cowommowonly seen riding huwuge flightless birds. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.elyrion.info:
The mysteriowouwus {0} defend their wowoowodland howomes with cowoloworfuwul magic and the ferowocity owof fire-breathing dragowons! 

They regard Natuwure as a howoly spirit and cannowot huwunt animals owor chowop dowown trees, instead they start the game with the uwuniquwue Enchantment tech that can tuwurn reguwular animals intowo powowerfuwul mowonsters. nya
tribes.yadakk.info:
The {0} started owouwut as a nowomadic tribe in the beauwutifuwul harsh Khalee plains. Nowow they are the traders owof the squwuare, cowonnecting their empire with impressive trade rowouwutes. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech. nya
tribes.polaris.info:
The {0} have lain trapped in the far reaches owof the freezing tuwundra fowor eowons, buwut were blessed by the uwunknowowable Gaami with the powower towo expand their uwunnatuwural icy terrain farther than the weather permits. 

With the might owof sleds and Mamowoowos, the mystical {0} are determined towo entowomb the Squwuare in ice and transfoworm the land intowo a frigid paradise. 

{0} starts the game with the ability towo freeze suwurrowouwunding terrain uwusing Mowoowonies. nya
